summary: This document contains various Schedule K-1 forms related to SV America Holdings, LLC and Blue Chip Capital, LLC for the tax year 2012. It details the partners' shares of income, deductions, and credits, as well as non-deductible expenses. The document highlights financial transactions and tax obligations of the partnerships.

persons.name: Blue Chip Capital LLC
persons.context: Blue Chip Capital LLC is listed as a partner in the financial records of SV America Holdings, LLC.

persons.name: SV America Holdings LLC
persons.context: SV America Holdings, LLC is the primary partnership referenced in the K-1 forms, detailing its financial activities.

connections.description: Blue Chip Capital LLC is a partner in SV America Holdings, LLC, sharing in its income and expenses.

keyFacts: The document includes multiple Schedule K-1 forms for the tax year 2012.
SV America Holdings, LLC and Blue Chip Capital, LLC are identified as partners.
The K-1 forms detail income, deductions, and credits for the partnerships.
Non-deductible expenses related to meals and entertainment are noted.
The document is marked as confidential and includes various financial figures.
